content: fuck trump dishcloth by danna rachel because sometimes you need to angry-knit finished measurements 10 in x 8 in yarn lily sugar n cream 100% cotton 120 yds/70 9 g or ~69 yards of worsted weight cotton needles us 7 4 5mm circular or straight needle or size to obtain gauge gauge 16 sts and 28 row = 4 in in stockinette stitch notes with so many lives being unnecessarily lost with so many black and brown people being murdered with so many babies in cages sometimes you ve just got to angry-knit so if this tickles your angry bone i hope you will join me in declaring fuck trump with every angry stitch normally i say happy knitting but today i say fuck you trump i am not asking for money for this pattern but i am asking that you vote if you are eligible that you turn others out to vote that you march that you give money and/or time to your favorite justice organization together we can overcome hate directions cast on 45 sts pithy row 11 k8 p2 k1 p2 k3 p2 k2 p4 k2 p2 k4 p2 k3 p2 k6 row 1 -
